entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: At Olivia Bain's request, you helped her son, Civius Bain, to end his time as a ryll smuggler.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find Civius Bain and convince him to quit the life of a ryll smuggler.
entries.journal_entry_title: Smuggle Civius Bain from the Smugglers
entries.task01_entrance_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smuggler Bunker
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with Civius Bain and convince him to quit being a ryll smuggler.
entries.task01_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smuggler Bunker
entries.task02_entrance_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smuggler Bunker
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The only way Civius Bain can leave the ryll smugglers is if the two smugglers he owes money to are gone. Defeat them.
entries.task02_task_display_string_1: Defeat Oret Sturm, a Ryll Smuggler
entries.task02_task_display_string_2: Defeat Jayrn Minoze, a Ryll Smuggler
entries.task02_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smuggler Bunker
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Wow, you did it! Now I can quit and never have to look over my shoulder for those two thugs. Thanks! I'm going to be the best accountant the galaxy has ever seen.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Comm. from Civius Bain: "Wow, you did it! Now I can quit and never have to look over my shoulder for those two thugs. Thanks!"
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Speak with Olivia Bain and let her know that her son, Civius, is no longer smuggling ryll.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Defeat the ryll smuggler known as Jaryn Minoze.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Defeat the ryll smuggler known as Oret Sturm.
